game_description: Band your friends together to explore a forgotten world filled with adventure, danger, and ancient secrets. Discover an abandoned town that you will turn into a sanctuary in this wild, untamed land. Journey across a vast medieval -fantasy world filled with mysteries and ancient secrets. Will you be a Warrior? A Blacksmith? A Crafter? Prepare for your next adventure by mastering a deep crafting system to create awesome gear, and bring your style to life with our huge range of outfits where you choose the colors. Explore dark caves and dangerous landscapes, where terrible monsters and treasures await. The deeper you delve, the nastier the monsters. But where else could unclaimed fortunes lie? Will your story become a legend, or will it end in tragedy? The Climbing Update Nov 2022: Unlock your full potential by visiting the Climbing Tower. The further you climb, the stronger your climbing abilities will be when adventuring in the wild. Use your newfound skills to uncover new areas, treasures and challenges. Can you make it to the top of the Climbing Tower?

review_4: My friends and I bought this game for Thanksgiving of â€˜22, and weâ€™ve been playing it since and weâ€™re STILL discovering new things. The developers have clearly put a lot of effort into building the game and itâ€™s mechanics. That said, Iâ€™d definitely look up the various guides made for this game on YouTube, because the game kinda just tosses you in without explaining much. It doesnâ€™t teach you how to make your own server, the tutorial is optional, and it only gives you the basics. The locations are vast, engaging, and honestly beautiful, (despite these graphics not really being stunning, I continuously find myself admiring the beauty of this world). Combat, crafting, exploring, and learning with a group of your friends is SO MUCH FUN. That said, I feel like this game would only be fun with friends. One little thing to note too - we *just* lost our server for some reason. The game crashed when we tried using the televator, and now we canâ€™t reboot our world. So weâ€™ve started a ticket with Township Taleâ€™s tech support. So hopefully we didnâ€™t lose the last yearâ€™s progress ğŸ™ƒ
review_5: letâ€™s start this off by saying this game is in my top 5 vr games ever. Gameplay is phenomenal. Graphics are not the greatest but just where it needs to be. Community is full of toxic 7 year olds, but if u find good people they will teach you everything you need to know. which is good because this game is confusing for beginners. I think the game really shines if u have a couple of friends on a private server with you. it really shows you the potential and gives you the pride of expanding your town. Overall, 10/10
